name: DopeWars

skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dope wars
des:
Halt -- is for matures only!

This skill is a 20th anniversary tribute to the classic calculator game DOPEWARS.

Please be well-advised: 
This skill is for the entertainment of consenting adults only. While it simulates the principles of market arbitrage using the names of commodities that are illegal for sale, possession, trade or use, there are no references to the actual use of any of these commodities within the game.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
